text: Karl Bernhard Dall (, 1 February 1941 - 23 November 2020) was a German comedian, singer, and television presenter. He was born in Emden, Lower Saxony. He was known for his roles in Freddy in the Wild West, Hotel Clausewitz and Student of the Bedroom. He was known for having a 'hanging' eye was caused by a congenital ptosis. On 11 November 2020, Dall was hospitalized after having a stroke while on set for Rote Rosen in Munich. He died twelve days later on 23 November at the age of 79. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Personal website * Biography * Interview with Karl Dall Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:German movie actors Category:German television actors Category:German stage actors Category:German voice actors Category:German singers Category:German television presenters Category:Actors from Lower Saxony
title: Karl Dall
